select b.board_no boardNo, b.board_title boardTitle, (select member_id from tbl_member where member_no = b.MEMBER_NO) boardWriterId, b.MEMBER_NO boardWriter, b.board_date boardDate, b.IS_SECRET isSecret, (select count(*) from TBL_COMMENT tc where tc.BOARD_NO = b.BOARD_NO) commentCount from ( select rownum rnum, a.* from ( select board_no, board_title, member_no, board_date, IS_SECRET from TBL_BOARD where BOARD_CODE = 'S' order by board_no desc ) a ) b left join TBL_MEMBER m on b.MEMBER_NO = m.MEMBER_NO where rnum between #{pageInfo.start} and #{pageInfo.end} ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
mapper.insert: insert into TBL_BOARD (BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, MEMBER_NO, BOARD_DATE, BOARD_CODE, IS_SECRET, IS_IMPORTANT) values ( #{boardNo}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{boardWriter}, sysdate, 'S', #{isSecret}, 'N' )
mapper.select: select b.board_no, b.board_title, b.board_content, b.member_no board_writer, b.board_date, b.board_code, b.is_important, b.is_secret, m.member_id from TBL_BOARD b left join TBL_MEMBER m on b.member_no = m.member_no where b.board_no = #{boardNo} and b.BOARD_CODE = 'S'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_COMMENT (COMMENT_NO, BOARD_NO, MEMBER_NO, COMMENT_CONTENT, COMMENT_DATE) VALUES (SEQ_COMMENT.NEXTVAL, #{boardNo}, #{memberNo}, #{commentContent}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT tc.COMMENT_NO commentNo, tc.BOARD_NO boardNo, tc.MEMBER_NO memberNo, tc.COMMENT_CONTENT commentContent, tc.COMMENT_DATE commentDate, tm.MEMBER_ID commentWriterId FROM TBL_COMMENT tc LEFT JOIN TBL_MEMBER tm ON tc.MEMBER_NO = tm.MEMBER_NO WHERE tc.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} ORDER BY tc.COMMENT_DATE ASC
